name: Terraform (itch)
description:
Made in 72 hours by Aaron Baumbach and Greg Lee for Ludum Dare 42

Special thanks to Steve Banks and a heap load of caffiene

If you're having performance issues please download the desktop build - it looks prettier too!

Controls

W/S/A/D = Move
Space = Jump
Left Click = Shoot
Right Click = Throw/Teleport
(Controller support available)

Creative Commons Audio

Music from https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/deep-blue
SFX from Freesound.org
